extendedInfo.description: Perfect for people with diabetes and those on low-carb diets, CarbsControl App keeps your carbs under control. â¨â¨With 80,000 foods and details from 300 restaurants and 500 specific brands, youâll know exactly where you stand with your carbs for the day. This App works great with the Atkins Diet, South Beach Diet, the Zone Diet, Protein Power Lifeplan, Go Lower Diet, and other low-carb plans. Itâs also helpful for those trying to lose weight or maintain their current weight by cutting back extra carb calories. This App helps you stick to your carb goals even when eating out. â¨â¨* Carbohydrate and other nutrition details for over 100,000 foods, 500 specific food brands, and 300 popular fast food and casual dining restaurantsâ¨* Internet connection not neededâ¨â¨* Set carb goals on a per meal basis â¨* Supports US and SI (metric) unitsâ¨* Keep track of your current carb count per-meal or by the entire dayâ¨* Adjust serving sizes to see the exact amount of carbs in your mealsâ¨* Create a "favorites" list for the foods you regularly eat * Email your log information that can be opened by any spreadsheet program.

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: I use this every day.   Does just what I need it to, and it does not need to connect to anything else.  Highly recommend you take the time to make custom entries to ensure higher accuracy.  Takes some time, but is worth it in the long run.  Just really wish this update included a fix for the font size on the main screen.  Too small for the resolution of my Galaxy S4.  This would be an easy fix... hope it comes soon.
reviews.author: John Aderholdt

reviews.title: Probably the best offline carb app
reviews.comment: I\'m now over 8 months into Atkins and almost 60 lbs lighter and a big reason I was able to stick with it I have to credit this app for. Even though there is a big database of foods built into the app I usually prefer to make my own custom entries and save them in favorites. I like that it tracks not only carbs and net carbs but calories, fats, protein sodium as well. .Have tried several other carb apps but this one works the best for me. .
reviews.author: Dave N

reviews.title: Far from perfect but...
reviews.comment: it\'s the best carb counter out there. It is not very intuitive and seems that, with a few simple tweaks, could be a very good carb counter. Why, oh why, can\'t anyone come up with a system like My Fitness Pal or Fat Secret that simply tracks carbs? I mean, how hard is that to do? I would pay money for it if someone ever does. I want to see the carbs I consume for each meal and throughout the day. I want a bar-code scanner. I want to save favorite meals/recipes that can be EASILY assigned to any meal of the day. I don\'t want to see the calories in overview screens (i.e., it should be elsewhere or should be able to be toggled on).  I want to track water intake, though this isn\'t a deal-breaker. Please, if any developers are reading this, take heed!
reviews.author: Quin Hess

reviews.title: THIS APP IS UNSTABLE
reviews.comment: I bought this app on my RAZR MAXX to allow me to look up and track carb usage for my 4 year old who is a Type 1 diabetic. After reading the reviews and the specs on the app, I purchased it and began running it through it\'s paces. That\'s when the disappointment set in. After every one or two food searches, the app would crash and need to be restarted. To be sure, I even rebooted her phone. By the time I determined that this app was too unstable to use, the 15 minute period had run out, and I can\'t find a way
reviews.author: Sarah Palmer

reviews.title: Helpful
reviews.comment: This app is straight forward and simple with lots of information. I\'m from the UK so some more UK brands/restaurants would be great but still definitely worth the download. I think it\'s great you can search restaurant menus.
reviews.author: Joanne Marie Brent

reviews.title: 14 carbs in eggs??????
reviews.comment: Thought this was a great app until I started entering food KNOWING there were no carbs but the app says there are. For example, it will tell you eggs have like 3-6 carbs each!!! Its inaccurate and that\'s the man problem. Waste of money if it doesn\'t track properly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: S II Epic 4g touch
reviews.comment: I\'d tried other carb tracking apps and this, BY FAR is the best one.  It let\'s me export the information into Excel to show to my dietician when I meet with her.  As a newly diagnosed Type II patient, this has been a lifesaver.  Thanks!
reviews.author: Melissa Cuellar

reviews.title: Love the ease of use.
reviews.comment: The easiest meal enrty I have found so far,
reviews.author: Ralph De Witt

reviews.title: ugh..
reviews.comment: I have type 1 diabetes, and I used to have an iphone, loved my calorie king app.. it was so accurate & free. now that I have a galaxy s4, trying to make my diabetes life easier again. I depend on apps like this when its really hard to count my carbs at restaurants.. but this apps needs to be a little more accurate because I take insulin for carbs... wrong information could lead to fatal issues.. like eggs, eggs dont have any carbs so please fix this!!
reviews.author: Amanda covino

reviews.title: Too time consuming
reviews.comment: Not easy to add foods.  Search feature is poor.  Not as many foods included as some of the free apps I have used. I\'m either adding all the food info myself or trying several different ways of wording to search.  Takes too much time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: It is so easy to use.
reviews.author: Judith Hollenbeck

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: I have not been able to open the app. It simply says it is not working.
reviews.author: Arlene Parker

reviews.title: Luv it
reviews.comment: I have been diabetic for 22years and this is great to use at resturants. It is also a great log for keeping track of other dietary needs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Major flaw...
reviews.comment: This app is huge! It took up 37 mb AND you can\'t move it to your SD card. It took almost all of my available space. I had to uninstall it... waste of money.
reviews.author: Kevin Vaughn

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Very cumbersome to use.  Absolutely not accurate.  Very disappointed!
reviews.author: Sandi Lopez

reviews.title: Needs work - good idea but not yet useful
reviews.comment: Food can only be entered in whole servings - if the serving is set to 1 cup, you can\'t enter 0.5 cups. This grossly inflated the numbers I got. The app is also a bit tricky to navigate.
reviews.author: Grace Cameron

reviews.title: It works!
reviews.comment: I\'ve lost 100 lbs using carbs  control. It takes a little work to get setup initially, but i like the interface better than anything else on the market.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t get it. Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: installed installed still doesn\'t work Won\'t even open
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pleased but not amazed
reviews.comment: It\'s a great app and would be 5 * if it had a exercise entry spot! Get a exercise generator and I will be amazed!
reviews.author: A Google User
